alert.note: Alert for Gogebic (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 3:39PM EST until January 30 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...VERY COLD WIND CHILL READINGS ARE EXPECTED LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MIDDAY MONDAY... .The combination of very cold temperatures and winds of 10 to 15 MPH will result in wind chill readings of around 25 below zero late tonight and into midday Monday. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected late tonight. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Gogebic County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
